title: Oekaki Avatar
name: Name
headInFront: Move Head in Front of Body
legsInFront: Move Legs in Front of Body
publishHint: Create a URL to share your avatar online. Only people with the URL can access it.
confirmDiscardDescription: All unsaved work will be lost.
textureInfo: You can create textures using external image editing software with the provided template. After creating, you can import the image using the 'Load' button.
exportable: This avatar is exportable. To export, please add it to your favorites.
notExportable: This avatar cannot be exported. Only adding to favorites is allowed.
modifiable: This avatar is modifiable. To modify, please add it to your favorites.
notModifiable: This avatar is not permitted for editing.
yourCreation: This avatar is created by you.
obs1: To use the microphone, launch OBS with the following startup flags. (The Steam version is easier to configure.)
obs2: In OBS, add a Browser Source to your scene and enter the following URL:
obs3: If you'd like to adjust the field of view, select the Browser Source in OBS, click “Interact,” and make adjustments in the window that appears.
